skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: The radiant glory of the Eldest God burns away the darkness

effects.description:
Ward Save: +5% for Phoenix and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Ward Save: +10% for Phoenix and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: An Anointed of Asuryan has known for centuries exactly how and when he will die. Accepting that unavoidable fate has made him completely unafraid of everyone and everything

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The mystical Frostheart Phoenix is a creature of legends, and forms a deadly pairing with the Anointed.

effects.description: Enables the Frostheart Phoenix mount for the Anointed

Passive Ability: " Asuryan Gives us Strength", while this Mount is equipped, for Eagle and Phoenix units
	(all units in army)

Passive Ability: " Asuryan Gives us Strength" for Eagle and Phoenix units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

Where the Anointed tread, the doubts and fears of their allies vanish like mist on the wind. Blows that should prove fatal are turned aside at the last moment, enemy axes shatter on contact with shields and dark sorceries collapse inward at the moment of casting

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

skillTree.localised_description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

skillTree.localised_description: The Anointed has learned to utilise the might of the Ithlimar Chariots effectively, there is not much that can stand in their way.

skillTree.localised_description: Those that risk their lives charging against the most hardened and destructive of their enemies need the best gear if they want to survive for long. Fortunately, Ulthuan´s gods are always willing to help the children of Asuryan

skillTree.localised_description: When the island continent is in danger, not only the Asur march to defend their nation. For thousands of years, their stalwart allies have fought as hard as them to preserve the balance and harmony of Ulthuan

skillTree.localised_description: After fighting countless battles alongside the elite infantry of Ulthuan no Anointed of Asuryan will ever forget the lessons he has learned nor he will waste any chance to put them to good use

skillTree.localised_description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

skillTree.localised_description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

skillTree.localised_description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

skillTree.localised_description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
“Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some warriors are like rocks - hard and immovable. This one is like jelly…
This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.
Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Bones are not supposed to be on the outside.
The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.
This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description:
Leadership: -10 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Our forefathers followed the way and overcame great adversity. We should not ignore their lessons."

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Right, are you listening? Good. There's only one way to do things and that's by the book."

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +7% for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There's something of the other world about this one; this cruel plane has failed to engage them.
Some minds are more susceptible to magical influence than others, but this one is strong indeed.
Immovable and resolute in their will, this one is as determined as the World Dragon himself!

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Dragon units (minimum 1)
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one would forget their head if it wasn't, er, attached.
This one understands tactics, and how to vary them, well enough to generally defeat the foe.
Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for infantry units
	(Lord's army)
